text:
First try looking into the default HubSpot module <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/modules/default-modules#language-switcher|Language Switcher> to see if that suits your needs.

But if you need more customization– I've built a custom language switcher using a HubDB solution inspired by <@U7SL518D6>’s language switcher for the HubSpot Developer Docs, which he demoed on a <https://www.youtube.com/live/tbQ0EkAXrm8?si=rj6VYGwkXg25uKSu&t=2156|livestream here>
